frameDefinitions: The Quantity of a Collection occurring in a Place has a particular Measure.
Authorities charge a Suspect, who is under suspicion of having committed a crime (the Charges), and take him/her into custody.'
An Entity is declared to exist, generally irrespective of its position or even the possibility of its position being specified.
An Entity exists at a particular Location, at a particular Time, as observed by an implicit observer.
frameExamples: Beauty is <t>abundant</t> in a land flowing with snowmelt.
The police <t>arrested</t> Harry on charges of manslaughter.
Finally, Poland ceased to <t>exist</t> as a state for hundreds of years.
Liquid water was <t>present</t> on the surface of Mars billions of years ago.
listRoleDefinitions: The feature of an <fen>Collection</fen> which is under discussion. This role is incorporated by all the lexical units in this frame.
The location in which the <fen>Collection</fen> occurs.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Collection</fen> is in the state of having  a particular <fen>Measure</fen> for the <fen>Quantity</fen>.
<fen>Charges</fen> identifies a category within the legal system; it is the crime with which the <fen>Suspect</fen> is charged.
The <fen>Authorities</fen> charge the <fen>Suspect</fen> with commiting a crime, and take him/her into custody.
The <fen>Suspect</fen> is taken into custody, under suspicion of having committed a crime.
<fen>Offense</fen> identifies the ordinary language use of the reason for which a <fen>Suspect</fen> is arrested.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the arrest occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the arrest occurs.
Some entity, abstract or concrete, which is stated to exist.
A time at which the entity is in existence.
The <fen>Entity</fen> whose existence at the <fen>Location</fen> is confirmed.
The <fen>Location</fen> of the <fen>Entity</fen>. The <fen>Location</fen> is conceived as a ground for an event of inspection to determine the presense of the <fen>Entity</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Entity</fen> is present at the <fen>Location</fen>.
listRoleExamples: Maggots began to teem <fex>in his black fur</fex>.
The police arrested Harry <fex>on charges of manslaughter</fex>.
<fex>The police</fex> arrested Harry on charges of manslaughter.
The police arrested <fex>Harry</fex> on charges of manslaughter.
The police arrested Harry <fex>on Wednesday afternoon</fex>.
The police arrested Harry <fex>in front of his house</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: A Billion Black Anthropocenes or None
